0.5.description: Created Plex Server, basic protonvpn and qBittorrent downloader, manual folder sorting.

0.6.description: Added radarr, sonarr for library organizing, dropbox shared folder and qBittorrent monitoring for mobile remote requests.

0.7.description: Added ombi, email notifications. Added Prowlarr.

1.0.description: Migration to lubuntu 20.04, use docker for services.

1.2.description: Introduction of cloudflare tunnel for overseerr, enabling remote requesting.

2.0.description: Launching all services through cloudflare tunnel for external access, and utilizing cloudflare access to protect them.

2.1.description: Introduce Uptime Kuma for remote monitoring and notifying, implement homebridge access through cloudflare.

2.2.description: Reconfigure hardware and docker config to prioritize better resource management. Install UPS to protect server from power outages and brownouts.

3.0.description: Launch of Minecraft Java Edition 1.21.1 Server utilizing Minekube tunnel and spigot connect .jar plugin for external access. Integrated into Uptime Kuma.

3.0.1.description: Polishing minecraft server.properties. Access for /op access to server admin.

3.0.2.description: Updated theme of updated theme of uptime kuma to be consistent with Plex experience. Added changelog.emeryverse.com to have externally accessed changelog website.

3.0.3.description: Created TheEmeryverse github repo for changelog website and other future projects. Now using for code storage for changelog website.

3.1.description: Automated container updating with updateContainers.sh and alias that automatically pulls latest commit and runs ./updateContainers.sh.

3.2.description: Added CRON functionality to root level update script to execute every Tuesday at 4am, and non root at 3am.
